title: HUI4 Lee 4 and 2
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Chinese, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out
description: A Buddhist style Chinese vegetarian/vegan restaurant. Serves mostly vegetable dishes with the exception of a few egg dishes. You can ask for dishes to be served without eggs though. The menu is only in Chinese and the owner only speaks Chinese. Name: 汇利和. Address: 天津市和平区承德道解放路派出所对面.
